alert.note: Alert for Logan; Weld (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 28 at 6:37PM MDT until June 28 at 7:15PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Weld County in northeastern Colorado... Northwestern Logan County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 715 PM MDT. * At 636 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles southwest of Kimball Airport, or 13 miles southwest of Kimball, moving southeast at 25 mph. This storm will cross into Colorado by 6:55 PM. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Westplains. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
